short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A button on GitHub issue page to reword comment

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the GPT GitHub Response Chrome Extension! With just one click, you can transform your comments into polished and respectful messages that will enhance the overall experience of the GitHub community.

The Improve button is prominently displayed on GitHub issue and PR pages, making it easy to access and use. When clicked, the extension leverages the power of chatGPT to make rewording suggestion for your comment. This ensures that your message is both comprehensive and respectful, helping to foster a more positive and collaborative environment on GitHub.
